title: WTB T206 Brooklyn on a budget
author: jason.1969

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Brooklyn on a budget
posts.post_content:
Hello, friends. Looking to add to my modest T206 Brooklyn collection. List of cards I still need is below. 

Also showing a pic of the cards I currently have to give a sense of the condition I collect: pretty good centering, no big creases, but round corners welcome. Would love to see what you have available.

Thank you! Jason
